# Chess Clock
A chess clock to use on your computer's browser!
![Chess Clock Preview](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/66463628/353265160-8b377ebc-4943-4aba-ad3c-7ce17d1a0946.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..MtV3wmoCpPbPmElizlFfic3Skby7NUQ3hd-YPVqJU-8)

## How To Use This App
1. Go ahead and open [this](https://mahyar-sahraei.github.io/chess_clock/) link.
2. Enter main time and the increament (fischer), then press start.
3. Run/Switch clocks by pressing any key on your keyboard, or by clicking on the clocks.
4. To change clock settings, just go back to the homepage.

## Issues
Feel free to open an issue if you encountered any problem or inconvenience while using this app.

## Warning
If you use your keyboard or touch screen to toggle clocks, make sure to not damage them by hitting them too hard!
